text: Maxim Gaudette (born June 8, 1974) is a Canadian actor from Quebec. He won both the Genie Award for Best Supporting Actor"Polytechnique sweeps Genie Awards". Toronto Star, April 12, 2010. and the Jutra Award for Best Supporting Actor"J'ai tué ma mère sacré meilleur film". Radio-Canada, March 29, 2010. in 2010 for his role as Marc Lépine in the 2009 film Polytechnique. Originally from Sherbrooke,"Maxim Gaudette : lumière intérieure". L'actualité, January 20, 2012. he is the son of former hockey player André Gaudette.http://magazineportrait.com/bientot-20-ans-de-metier/ He graduated from the Conservatoire d'art dramatique de Montréal in 1997."Maxim Gaudette : s'effacer pour mieux briller". La Presse, September 7, 2010.
